member.name: IDCompositionVisual2.SetBackFaceVisibility
member.summary: Specifies whether or not surfaces that have 3D transformations applied to them should be displayed when facing away from the observer.

param.name: visibility
param.para: The back face visibility to use when composing surfaces in this visual’s sub-tree to the screen.

member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual2.SetOpacityMode
member.summary: Sets the opacity mode for this visual.

param.name: mode
param.code: The opacity mode to use when composing the visual to the screen.

member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual2
member.summary: Represents one DirectComposition visual in a visual tree.
